creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by Audrey Seo and Stephen Addiss
description: fan with ten lines of characters, mostly alternating between approx. 4 characters and 2 characters; rectangular relief stamp URC; two plain square relief stamps LL; mounted on burgundy colored board
markings: URC, rectangular relief stamp; L center, square relief stamp; L center, square relief stamp; on back of mount, LLQ, in pencil: Tenju
title: Poem
